articles.author: Jason Hanna, Rebekah Riess, Sara Smart and Andy Rose, CNN
articles.title: California's fast-moving Oak Fire burns nearly 12,000 acres and forces evacuations outside Yosemite National Park
articles.description: A wildfire raging for a second day Saturday in central California's Mariposa County outside Yosemite National Park has burned nearly 12,000 acres and forced evacuations of rural communities, fire officials said.
articles.content: A wildfire raging for a second day Saturday in central California's Mariposa County outside Yosemite National Park has burned nearly 12,000 acres and forced evacuations of rural communities, fire off… [+11 chars]

articles.title: Monkeypox officially becomes a global emergency
articles.description: The World Health Organization says the expanding monkeypox outbreak in more than 70 countries is an "extraordinary" situation that now qualifies as a global emergency.
articles.content: The expanding monkeypox outbreak in more than 70 countries is an "extraordinary" situation that qualifies as a global emergency, the World Health Organization chief said Saturday, a declaration that … [+6112 chars]

articles.author: Adam Sabes
articles.title: Lee Zeldin's attempted attacker told investigators he 'did not know' speaker's identity
articles.description: The would-be attacker who "lunged" at Rep. Lee Zeldin, R-N.Y. told investigators that he didn't know who the Congressman was at the time of the alleged attempted attack.
articles.content:
The would-be attacker who "lunged" at Rep. Lee Zeldin, R-N.Y.,
on Thursday told investigators that he "did not know" who the speaker on stage was and said he had been drinking whiskey earlier in the… [+3877 chars]

articles.title: Maquoketa Caves State Park camper heard a scream and a loud noise near site of triple homicide
articles.description: A mother camping with her family recalls seeing the boy who survived the attack. 'Nobody was holding him… He was just standing there in his pajamas.'
articles.content:
MAQUOKETA — Felicia Coe awoke with optimism.

articles.title: Ivan Bates wins Democratic primary for Baltimore State’s Attorney; Mosby, Vignarajah concede race
articles.description: Defense attorney Ivan Bates has won the Democratic primary for Baltimore’s top prosecutor, defeating incumbent State’s Attorney Marilyn Mosby, who will leave the office after two terms.
